name: Swarm of Insects
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) piercing damage  or 5 (1d10) piercing damage if the swarm is bloodied.

actions.name: Venom
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage  or 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage if the swarm is bloodied.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creatures space and move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. It can't gain hit points or temporary hit points.
